Package fast3d.simple.shapes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Box
    a geometric body builder to create boxes, cubes, colorcube or rectangular prisms
    Cone
    a geometric body builder to create cones or pyramids
    Cylinder
    a geometric body builder to create cylinders or general prisms
    GeometricBodyBuilder
    base class for constructing groups of triangles or AdvTriangles (depending on what field you set (material or color)) that make up the shape of a geometric body (a box or cone for instance)
    at least setMaterial(Material) XOR setColor() has to be set (if both are set than color is ignored)
    multiple builds are independent to one another
    at last, when all attributes are set, call build() to create a Group of the specified shape
    subclasses are meant to build the shapes around Vector3d.zero() (as the groups center) and by default of size (diameter) 1d
    Sphere
    a geometric body builder to create spheres (no ellipses)
    ellipses can be achieved by calling g.forEveryVertex(v lambda v.scale(Vector3d)); on the resulting Group
